default.name: Default
default.description: Includes rules for levels 1, 2 & 3 of SLSA v0.1. This is the default config used for new RHTAP applications.

minimal.name: Minimal (deprecated)
minimal.description: Includes a set of basic checks that are expected to pass for all RHTAP builds.

redhat.name: Red Hat
redhat.description: Includes the full set of rules and policies required internally by Red Hat when building Red Hat products.

redhat-no-hermetic.name: Red Hat (non hermetic)
redhat-no-hermetic.description: Includes most of the rules and policies required internally by Red Hat when building Red Hat products. It excludes the requirement of hermetic builds.

slsa1.name: SLSA1 (deprecated)
slsa1.description: Rules specifically related to levels 1 of SLSA v0.1, plus a set of basic checks that are expected to pass for all RHTAP builds.

slsa2.name: SLSA2 (deprecated)
slsa2.description: Rules specifically related to levels 1 & 2 of SLSA v0.1, plus a set of basic checks that are expected to pass for all RHTAP builds.

slsa3.name: SLSA3
slsa3.description: Rules specifically related to levels 1, 2 & 3 of SLSA v0.1, plus a set of basic checks that are expected to pass for all RHTAP builds.

everything.name: Everything (experimental)
everything.description: Include every rule in the default policy source. For experiments only. This is not expected to pass for RHTAP builds without excluding some rules.

github-default.name: GitHub Default
github-default.description: Rules for container images built via GitHub Workflows.
